document_name: SIGNED PROJECT DOCUMENT WOMEN EMPOWERMENT and GENDER MAINSTREAMING.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/GMB/SIGNED PROJECT DOCUMENT WOMEN EMPOWERMENT and GENDER MAINSTREAMING.pdf

outputs.output_descr: Gender mainstreamed in National Policies and legal frameworks adopted such as The Gender Policy, Women's Act and Gender Based Violence Bill. Awareness creation and advocacy on Women in Politics and Gender Based Violence increased. Capacity development & Institution strengthened women machinery (i.e. Women's Bureau and The National Women's Council)

project_descr: The project outcome is to improve opportunity for gender equality and integration of gender into development strategies/actions and the outputs is to update policy development, capacity building and awareness creation in gender equality & mainstreaming
